## Checks
- [ ] Lint & Build grün
- [ ] Tests + Coverage ≥ 80 %
- [ ] Contract / schema_drift = 0 (OpenAPI, Types)
- [ ] Security-Gates (Anti-Replay, Device-Proof, Plan-Gates)
- [ ] GDPR/Compliance (DSR, Retention, EU-Only)
- [ ] Terraform / Infra (fmt/validate, EU-Region)
- [ ] Observability / FinOps (Dashboards aktualisiert, cost_per_tenant geprüft)

## Evidence
